issue.title: Camera Noise Does Not Obey Global Seed

content.raw:
Thanks for the bug report!

The inputs to the Camera noise algorithm are sent at [GaussianNoiseModel.cc:56-58](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/5bf694d6b33163509a25eccd61592b0085fb5336/gazebo/sensors/GaussianNoiseModel.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#GaussianNoiseModel.cc-56), which comes from the `ignition::math` random number generator, so it should respect the seed.

Camera sensors are in their own thread through, so I'm wondering if each thread needs to set the random seed?

Your thoughts @iche033 ?
content.html:
Thanks for the bug report!

The inputs to the Camera noise algorithm are sent at GaussianNoiseModel.cc:56-58, which comes from the ignition::math random number generator, so it should respect the seed.

Camera sensors are in their own thread through, so I'm wondering if each thread needs to set the random seed?

Your thoughts @iche033 ?
